speaker: Saurabh Mishra
quote: The teamwork on display here is just phenomenal... The way you all collaborated to resolve the integration issues is exactly what I want to see. This is A+ work, team. I'll be nominating the project for a 'Team Spotlight Award' at the next town hall.
rationale: Manager provides formal team recognition for collaborative problem-solving and project execution, with concrete outcome of award nomination at town hall.
evidence: teamwork on display here is just phenomenal

speaker: Saurabh Mishra
quote: It's clear that Anjali's diligence and Rohan's expertise were critical here. I will personally send a note of thanks to both of them and make sure their managers are aware of their specific, high-impact contributions. That kind of support deserves to be celebrated.
rationale: Manager recognizes Anjali's contribution in fixing Kafka data quality issues that enabled the project's progress, with commitment to formal recognition to her manager.
